query:
SELECT
                ra.collection_id,
                ra.nft_id,
                ra.price            AS bought,
                ra.usd_price        AS bought_usd,
                sa.price            AS sold,
                sa.usd_price        AS sold_usd
            FROM activities ra
                LEFT JOIN activities sa ON ra.receiver = sa.sender AND ra.nft_id = sa.nft_id
            WHERE ra.receiver IS NOT NULL
                AND ($1::TEXT IS NULL OR $1::TEXT = '' OR ra.receiver = $1)
            LIMIT $2 OFFSET $3
